name: Daily Cashier Sales
query:
SELECT
    t1.name AS 'POS Closing ID',
    t1.custom_cashier_name AS 'Cashier',
    t1.custom_shift AS 'Shift',
    t1.posting_date AS 'Date',
    t1.posting_time AS 'Time',
    t1.pos_profile AS 'POS Profile',
    'Cash and Cheque' AS 'Mode of Payment', 
    SUM(t2.expected_amount) AS 'Expected Amount',
    SUM(t2.expected_amount) - SUM(t2.opening_amount) AS 'Cash Sales',
    t3.name  AS 'Cash Count ID',
    t3.custom_cash_count_total AS 'Cash Count Total'
FROM
    `tabPOS Closing Entry` t1
JOIN
    `tabPOS Closing Entry Detail` t2
ON
    t1.name = t2.parent
JOIN
    `tabCash Count Denomination Entry` t3
ON
    t1.name = t3.custom_pos_closing_entry_id  
WHERE
    t1.docstatus = 1
    AND t2.mode_of_payment IN ('Cash', 'Cheque')
GROUP BY
    t1.name, t1.owner, t1.custom_cashier_name, t1.custom_shift;
